EmailTemplate.name: Octurbofest 2014.Reg Confirmation - Day & Game
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: Octurbofest 2014 (Conference & Game)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{Lead.First Name:default=}}:
Thank you for registering to attend Octurbofest 2014! You have elected to register for both the Conference & Bruins Game. Details for your reservation are below.
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{Company.Company Name:default=}} Octurbofest Conference & Bruins Game Octurbofest 2014 Wednesday, October 8 10:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. The Omni Parker House Hotel | The King Room, Mezzanine Level 60 School Street, Boston, MA 02108
Transportation to and from the Boston Bruins Home Opener will be provided by VMTurbo following the conference at Omni Parker House. Puck drops at 7:30 p.m.
We cannot wait to see you at this exciting event. If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com>.
Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
